info.name: ourguide.com.au - night colors+hover
info.description: dark color, wide columns, hover menu
info.additionalInfo:
Known issues: From hover menu, some drop down sub-menu list items are showing items as black text (should be green) on black background - it seems to occur on some list items randomly I have not found way to fix that yet (if you carefully highlight the item you can see text). If you are a CSS guru please help.

Dec 2016 - hover menu is not positioned correctly due to recent web site changes
